incidents.name: Twilio Flex - Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Were creating the notification comms in reference to a planned maintenance in all regions between 9:00 PM PST to 11:59PM Pacific Time on 07/29/2025. Since the reboot have been completed, were resolving this proactive communication. Systems are operational.

Were creating this proactive comms in reference to a planned maintenance in all regions between 9:00 PM PST to 11:59PM Pacific Time on 07/29/2025.
Well start the cluster reboot in the next 10 minutes, which will last about 10 seconds. Customers may experience the following during the cluster reboots:
-Login failures for customers logging in via legacy SSO (customers with enhanced SSO are not impacted) or console.
-Customers that are already logged in may be logged out from Flex UI or Webchat.
-Customers using Webchat may be unable to initiate new sessions or see disruptions to their existing sessions (token refresh failure).
-Customers should be able to re-login after the impact period in case of login failure during the maintenance window.
